attributes.action: To keep the gym’s open during November’s lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
We want the government to keep the gyms open not only to keep as fit and active during lockdown but also for the mental health of the country too

Boris has even stated that we have become obese as a nation as a result of these lockdown measures and mental health cases have skyrocketed as well

Keeping the gyms open will save people from a mental breakdown
attributes.background: We would like the government to not close the gym’s down during November’s 4 week lockdown

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
